The Bordryns Bucket was a tavern of some repute in the city of Athkatla in Amn.
The Bordryns Bucket was a favorite local establishment in the citys Bridge District as of the late 14 century DR. However, the Bucket was not distinct enough for the famous writer Volothamp Geddarm to talk about it in any detail in his book â€“ Volos Guide to Baldurs Gate, published at some point in the late 14 century DR.
